Ismael is an absolute delight for beginners. He teaches with kindness and patience, making tennis both enjoyable and accessible. From the first lesson, his friendly approach and clear explanations create a comfortable learning atmosphere. He teaches complex techniques into manageable steps, boosting confidence. His passion for tennis motivates and positive feedback fosters a sense of accomplishment. For a fun and rewarding tennis journey, I highly recommend this coach!

My kid is having a group tennis course with Coach Ismael. They are enjoying it. My kid said  coach Ismael's lessons are different with other coache's. He always allow them to play games during classes instead of learning skills in whole lesson. It's fun and interesting.
